title: Advancing H&E-to-IHC Stain Translation in Breast Cancer: A Multi-Magnification and Attention-Based Approach
abstract: arXiv:2408.01929v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: Breast cancer presents a significant healthcare challenge globally, demanding precise diagnostics and effective treatment strategies, where histopathological examination of Hematoxylin and Eosin (H&E) stained tissue sections plays a central role. tldr: 该文章提出了一种新模型，该模型结合了注意力机制和多放大信息的处理，以在图像到图像的翻译中解决乳腺癌H&E染色组织切片评估HER2生物标志物的问题。通过整合多放大信息处理和注意力机制，文章的创新在于提高了从H&E染色到IHC染色翻译任务的精确度，这对于进行个性化的乳腺癌治疗策略具有重要意义。
